author: Staff Reporter
text: A 35-year-old man was found on a pavement frothing at the mouth on Rhenius Street, Richmond Town, on Friday morning. Passersby shifted him to a nearby hospital. The man identified as Kodanda Reddy, a resident of Madiwala and a textile industrialist, is said to be in a critical condition. The Ashoknagar police said that preliminary inquiries revealed that he had consumed some kind of poison in a bid to end his life. “We have informed his family members, and due to his condition, he has been shifted to another hospital,” said a police officer. A case is yet to be registered as the police have not yet recorded Mr. Reddy’s statement.
title: Industrialist attempts suicide
